channel.title: Comments on: PJ Harvey “Grow Grow Grow” live on Late Night with Jay Leno 10.16.2007

item.title: By: Michael Paul Rodiguez
item.dc:creator: Michael Paul Rodiguez
item.description: I would like to thank whom ever, booked PJ Harvey on your Show, It was a great choice for the show, Taht I happend to catch, Out here In Iraq. I Love this song one of the Greats in my book, and I think She(PJ), might have made some new fans, she's such a fantastic artist, and musician. PJ did a great job, I hope all go well as she tours, take care all. MICHAEL P. RODRIGUEZ
item.content:encoded:
I would like to thank whom ever, booked PJ Harvey on your Show, It was a great choice for the show, Taht I happend to catch, Out here In Iraq. I Love this song one of the Greats in my book, and I think She(PJ), might have made some new fans, she’s such a fantastic artist, and musician. PJ did a great job, I hope all go well as she tours, take care all.
MICHAEL P. RODRIGUEZ
